Protocols/ResultsController.html.name: ResultsController
Protocols/ResultsController.html.abstract: A ResultsController manages data in a way that is usable by a collection view.

Protocols/ResultsControllerDelegate.html.name: ResultsControllerDelegate
Protocols/ResultsControllerDelegate.html.abstract: The ResultsControllerDelegate defines methods that allow you to respond to changes in the results controller.

Classes/MutableResultsController.html.name: MutableResultsController
Classes/MutableResultsController.html.abstract: A results controller not only manages data, it also provides an easy to use, consistent interface for working with CollectionViews. While a typical controller fetches and manages data changes internally, this slimmed down version leaves the manipulation of it’s content up to you so you can use the same interface with any type of data.

Classes/FetchedResultsController.html.name: FetchedResultsController
Classes/FetchedResultsController.html.abstract: A FetchedResultsController provides the same data store and change reporting as a MutableResultsController but sources it’s contents from a CoreData context.

Classes/RelationalResultsController.html.name: RelationalResultsController
Classes/RelationalResultsController.html.abstract: Extending on FetchedResultsController and it’s section grouping, this controller allows for sections to be created from a parent ententy.-

Classes/FetchedSetController.html.name: FetchedSetController
Classes/FetchedSetController.html.abstract: A results controller that does not concern itself with the order of objects, but only their membership to the supplied fetch request.

Results Controller.html#/s:14CollectionV.name: ResultsControllerChangeType
Results Controller.html#/s:14CollectionV.abstract: The types of changes reported to ResultsControllerDelegate

Classes/CollectionViewProvider.html.name: CollectionViewProvider
Classes/CollectionViewProvider.html.abstract: A helper object to easily track changes reported by a ResultsController and apply them to a CollectionView

Classes/CollectionViewResultsProxy.html.name: CollectionViewResultsProxy
Classes/CollectionViewResultsProxy.html.abstract: A Helper to convert data set changes into collection view edits

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html.name: CollectionViewLayout
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html.abstract: The CollectionViewLayout class is an abstract base class that you subclass and use to generate layout information for a collection view. The job of a layout object is to determine the placement of cells, supplementary views inside the collection viewâ€™s bounds and to report that information to the collection view when asked. The collection view then applies the provided layout information to the corresponding views so that they can be presented onscreen.

Classes/CollectionViewLayoutAttributes.h.name: CollectionViewLayoutAttributes
Classes/CollectionViewLayoutAttributes.h.abstract: An UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes object manages the layout-related attributes for a given item in a collection view. Layout objects create instances of this class when asked to do so by the collection view. In turn, the collection view uses the layout information to position cells and supplementary views inside its bounds.

Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html.name: CollectionViewListLayout
Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html.abstract: A list layout that makes CollectionView a perfect alternative to NSTableView

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateListLayo.name: CollectionViewDelegateListLayout
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateListLayo.abstract: A vertical list based layout similiar to a native table view

Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html.name: CollectionViewColumnLayout
Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html.abstract: This layout is column based which means you provide the number of columns and cells are placed in the appropriate one. It can be display items all the same size or as a Pinterest style layout.

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateColumnLa.name: CollectionViewDelegateColumnLayout
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateColumnLa.abstract: The delegate for CollectionViewColumnLayout to dynamically customize the layout

Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.name: finishTransition(fromItemAt:in:)
Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.abstract: Called when the transition from the source has completed and the cell is in it’s final position.

Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.name: prepareForTransition(toItemAt:in:)
Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.abstract: Called just before the cell is transitioned back to it’s source

Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.name: transition(toItemAt:in:)
Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.abstract: Called within the transition animation block in which the cell should move back to its source.

Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.name: finishTransition(toItemAt:in:)
Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.abstract: Called when the transition back to the source has completed and the containing preview controller will be removed.

Classes/CollectionReusableView.html#/s:1.abstract: Called just after the view was added to the collection view

Classes/CollectionReusableView.html#/s:1.name: apply(_:animated:)
Classes/CollectionReusableView.html#/s:1.abstract: Applies the specified layout attributes to the view.

Classes/CollectionReusableView.html#/s:1.name: disableTracking()
Classes/CollectionReusableView.html#/s:1.abstract: Disable tracking (used for highlighting in cells) for this view

Classes/CollectionReusableView.html#/s:1.name: enableTracking()
Classes/CollectionReusableView.html#/s:1.abstract: Enable tracking for this view (called by default for cells)

Classes/CollectionViewCell.html#/s:14Col.name: defaultReuseIdentifier
Classes/CollectionViewCell.html#/s:14Col.abstract: Provide a reuse identifier for all cells of this class, defaults to the class name

Classes/CollectionViewCell.html#/s:14Col.name: register(in:)
Classes/CollectionViewCell.html#/s:14Col.abstract: Register a CollectionViewCell subclass to a collection view using the class’s defaultReuseIdentifier

Classes/CollectionViewCell.html#/s:14Col.name: deque(for:in:)
Classes/CollectionViewCell.html#/s:14Col.abstract: Deque a cell of this class from a collection view. Uses defaultReuseIdentifier

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:shouldBeginDraggingAt:with:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate if a dragging session should be started

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:validateIndexPathsForDrag:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate to validate the selected items for drag.

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:draggingSession:willBeginAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a dragging session will begin

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:draggingSession:didEndAt:with:draggedIndexPaths:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a dragging session ended

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:draggingSession:didMoveTo:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a dragging session moved

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:dragEntered:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate for an operation for the drag at its current state when it enters the collection view

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:dragUpdated:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate for an operation for the drag at its current state as it updates

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:dragExited:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a drag exited the collection view as a dragging destination

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:dragEnded:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a drag ended in the collection view as a dragging destination

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: collectionView(_:performDragOperation:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: Asks the delegate to handle the drop in the collection view

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionViewWillReloadLayout(_:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view will reload it’s layout

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionViewDidReloadLayout(_:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view finished reloading it’s layout

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didChangeFirstResponderStatus:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view has changed status as first responder

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:mouseMovedToSection:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the mouse has moved into the frame of a section.

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:mouseDownInItemAt:with:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the mouse was clicked down in the specified index path

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:mouseUpInItemAt:with:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the mouse was released in the specified index path

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:shouldHighlightItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Asks the delegate if the item at the specified index path should highlight

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:shouldSelectItemsAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Asks the delegate to approve the pending selection of items.

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didSelectItemsAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate object that one or more items were selected.

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:shouldDeselectItemsAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Asks the delegate object to approve the pending deselection of items.

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didDeselectItemsAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate object that one or more items were deselected.

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didDoubleClickItemAt:with:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that an item was double clicked

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didRightClickItemAt:with:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that an item was right clicked

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:willDisplaySupplementaryView:ofElementKind:at:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a supplementary view will bw displayed

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didEndDisplayingCell:forItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a cell was removed from view

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didEndDisplayingSupplementaryView:ofElementKind:at:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a supplementary view was removed from view

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionViewLayoutAnchor(_:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Asks the delegate for an index path to anchor when resizing

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionViewDidEndLiveResize(_:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view did begin resizing

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:shouldScrollToItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Asks the delegate if the collection view should scroll to an item

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:didScrollToItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view did complete a scrolling action

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionViewDidScroll(_:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view was scrolled

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionViewWillBeginScrolling(_:animated:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view will begin scrolling

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.name: collectionViewDidEndScrolling(_:animated:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Notifies the delegate that the collection view did end scrolling

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.name: numberOfSections(in:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.abstract: Asks your data source for the number of sections in the collectin view

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.name: collectionView(_:numberOfItemsInSection:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.abstract: Asks your data source object for the number of items in the specified section.

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.name: collectionView(_:cellForItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.abstract: Asks your data source object for the cell that corresponds to the specified item in the collection view.

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.name: collectionView(_:viewForSupplementaryElementOfKind:at:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.abstract: Asks your data source object to provide a supplementary view to display in the collection view.

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.name: collectionView(_:pasteboardWriterForItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.abstract: Asks your data source for a pasteboard writing for the item at the specified index path

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.name: collectionView(_:dragContentsForItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.abstract: Asks the data source for the drag contents for the item at the specified index path

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.name: collectionView(_:dragRectForItemAt:withStartingRect:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html#.abstract: Asks the data source to validate the drag rect for an item to be dragged, allowing for adjustment.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/c:@M@Collec.name: delegate
Classes/CollectionView.html#/c:@M@Collec.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate to the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: dataSource
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: The object that provides data for the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: contentDocumentView
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: The content view in which all cells and views are displayed

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: register(class:forCellWithReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Register a class to be initialized when loading reusable cells

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: register(nib:forCellWithReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Register a nib to be loaded as reusable cells

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: register(class:forSupplementaryViewOfKind:withReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Register a class to be initialized when loading reusable supplementary views

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: register(nib:forSupplementaryViewOfKind:withReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Register a nib to be loaded as a supplementary view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: dequeueReusableCell(withReuseIdentifier:for:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Retrieve a cell for a given reuse identifier and index path.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: dequeueReusableSupplementaryView(ofKind:withReuseIdentifier:for:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns a reusable supplementary view located by its identifier and kind.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: floatingContentView
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: A view atop the collection view used to display non-scrolling accessory views

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: addAccessoryView(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Adds the given view to the floating content view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: numberOfSections
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the number of sections displayed by the collection view.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: numberOfItems(in:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the number of items in the specified section.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: reloadData()
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Reloads all the data and views in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: collectionViewLayout
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: The layout used to organize the collected viewâ€™s items.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: contentVisibleRect
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: The visible rect of the document view that is visible

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: contentOffset
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: The offset of the content view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: prepareAll
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Force layout of all items, not just those in the visible content area

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: frameForSection(at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the frame for the specified section

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: reloadDataOnBoundsChange
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Reload the data (section & item counts) when the collectionView bounds change. Defaults to false.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: needsLayoutReload
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the collection view layout should be reloaded on the next view layout. needsLayout is also if needed.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: reloadLayout(_:scrollPosition:completion:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Reload the collection view layout and apply the updated frames to the cells/views.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: isScrolling
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns true if the collection view is currently scrolling

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: scrollVelocity
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the current velocity of a scroll in points/second

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: peakScrollVelocity
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the peak valocity of a scroll during the last scrolling session

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPathsForVisibleSections
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the lowest index path of all visible items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPathForFirstVisibleItem
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the lowest index path of all visible items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: _indexPathForFirstVisibleItem
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Same as indexPathForFirstVisibleItem but doesn’t ask the delegate for a suggestion. This is a convenient variable to use in collectionViewLayoutAnchor(_:) but asking the delegate within is not possibe.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: animationDuration
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: The duration of animations when performing animated layout changes

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: performBatchUpdates(_:completion:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Perform multiple updates to be applied together

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Insert sections at the given indexes

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: deleteSections(_:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Remove sections and their items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: moveSection(_:to:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Move a section and its items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Insert items at specific index paths

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: deleteItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Deletes the items at the specified index paths.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: reloadItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Reload the items and the given index paths.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: moveItem(at:to:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Moves the item from it’s current index path to another

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: trackSectionHover
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: If true, the delegate’s collectionView(_:,mouseMovedToSection:) will be notified when the cursor is within a section frame

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: allowsSelection
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: If the collection view should allow selection of its items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: SelectionMode
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Determine how item selections are managed

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: selectionMode
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Determines what happens when an item is clicked

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: allowsMultipleSelection
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Allows the selection of multiple items via modifier keys (command & shift) (default true)

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: allowsEmptySelection
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: If true, clicking empty space will deselect all items (default true)

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: notifyDelegate
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: If true, programatic changes will be reported to the delegate (i.e. selections)

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: repeatSelections
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: If true, selecting an already selected item will notify the delegate (default true)

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPathForHighlightedItem
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: The index path of the highlighted item, if any

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: highlightItem(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Manually set the highlighted item reguardless of the cursor location

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPathsForSelectedItems
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the index paths for all selected items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: sortedIndexPathsForSelectedItems
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the index paths for all selected items ordered from first to last

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: itemAtIndexPathIsSelected(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns if the item at a given index path is selected

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: selectAllItems(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Selects all items in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: selectItem(at:animated:scrollPosition:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Select an item at a given index path

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: selectItems(at:animated:scrollPosition:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Select the items at the given index paths

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: deselectItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Deselect cells at given index paths

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: deselectAllItems(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Deselect all items in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: deselectItem(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Deselect the item at a given index path

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: visibleCells
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns all visible cells in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPathsForVisibleItems
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: / Returns the index paths for all visible cells in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: itemAtIndexPathIsVisible(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns true if the item at the index path is visible

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: cellForItem(at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the cell at a given index path if it is visible

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPath(for:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the index path for a cell in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPathForItem(at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns a index path for the item at a given point

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: firstIndexPathForItem(near:radius:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the first index path within a given distance of a point

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: firstIndexPathForItem(in:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the first index path found intersecting a given rect

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: indexPathsForItems(in:)

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Returns the index path for a supplementary view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: supplementaryView(forElementKind:at:)

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.name: applyChanges(from:completion:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:14Collect.abstract: Apply all changes in a change set to a collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html.name: CollectionView
Classes/CollectionView.html.abstract: A Collection View manages the presentation of items, your app’s main job is to provide the data that those items are to represent.

Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html.name: CollectionViewDataSource
Protocols/CollectionViewDataSource.html.abstract: The CollectionViewDataSource is responsible for providing the data and views required by a collection view

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html.name: CollectionViewDelegate
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegate.html.abstract: The CollectionViewDelegate protocol defines methods that allow you to manage the status, selection, highlighting, and scrolling of items in a collection view and to perform actions on those items. The methods of this protocol are all optional.

Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.name: CollectionViewDragDelegate
Protocols/CollectionViewDragDelegate.htm.abstract: The CollectionViewDragDelegate forwards system drag functions to the delegate in the context of a Collection View.

Classes/CollectionViewCell.html.name: CollectionViewCell
Classes/CollectionViewCell.html.abstract: A CollectionViewCell object presents the content for a single data item when that item is within the collection viewâ€™s visible bounds. You can use this class as-is or subclass it to add additional properties and methods. The layout and presentation of cells is managed by the collection view and its corresponding layout object.

Classes/CollectionReusableView.html.name: CollectionReusableView
Classes/CollectionReusableView.html.abstract: The CollectionReusableView class defines the behavior for all cells and supplementary views presented by a collection view. Reusable views are so named because the collection view places them on a reuse queue rather than deleting them when they are scrolled out of the visible bounds. Such a view can then be retrieved and repurposed for a different set of content.

Classes/CollectionViewController.html.name: CollectionViewController
Classes/CollectionViewController.html.abstract: The UICollectionViewController class represents a view controller whose content consists of a collection view.

Classes/CollectionViewPreviewController..name: CollectionViewPreviewController
Classes/CollectionViewPreviewController..abstract: An easy to use CollectionViewController that transitions from a source collection view.

Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.name: CollectionViewPreviewTransitionCell
Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewTransitio.abstract: A protocol for CollectionViewCells that need to customize their transition when used in CollectionViewPreviewController.

Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewControlle.name: CollectionViewPreviewControllerDelegate
Protocols/CollectionViewPreviewControlle.abstract: a CollectionViewPreviewControllerDelegate is responsible for providing data to a CollectionViewPreviewController.
